description: End users may experience unauthorized actions or unexpected behaviors on their systems where the Microsoft Remote Registry Service is active. This issue primarily affects multiple Windows 10 and 11 build numbers, including 10.0.22631.2715 and 10.0.19045.3693. The security updates associated with this CVE are documented in KB-5032189, KB-5032190, KB-5032192, and KB-5032199, and should be applied to mitigate these risks.
